The (temple) Capital

Home to over ten million people (and much more in the metro region), Bangkok has endless sights. Its street life, museums, temples, and skyline definitely mean you can spend countless hours exploring. On the other hand, its insane traffic, diagnosed urban planning (lack of proper zoning until recently), and hot humid weather. Nevertheless, below are some of my favorites.
